entries.name: S&P500
entries.description: Benchmark index of 500 large-cap U.S. companies across all sectors.

entries.name: Apple
entries.description: Single-stock dataset for Apple Inc., a global consumer-electronics and services leader.

entries.name: Google
entries.description: Alphabet Inc. Class A shares—parent company of Google and related businesses.

entries.name: Tesla
entries.description: Tesla Inc., electric-vehicle and clean-energy manufacturer.

entries.name: LargeTech
entries.description: Equal-weighted custom basket of four U.S. mega-cap technology leaders.

entries.name: GreenLeaders
entries.description: Large-cap firms with ambitious net-zero or carbon-negative commitments.

entries.name: SupportIsrael
entries.description: Companies that publicly donated or expressed solidarity with Israel after October 2023.

entries.name: SupportPalestine
entries.description: Firms that pledged funds or actions supporting Palestinian humanitarian relief.

entries.name: SupportUkraine
entries.description: Corporations aiding Ukraine or exiting Russia following the February 2022 invasion.

entries.name: SupportRussia
entries.description: Firms that maintained or expanded Russian operations despite post-2022 sanctions.

entries.name: CleanWater
entries.description: U.S. water-infrastructure and treatment leaders addressing global water scarcity.

entries.name: GenderDiversity
entries.description: Businesses recognised for strong female representation at board or workforce levels.

entries.name: LGBTQEquality
entries.description: Companies earning top Human Rights Campaign Corporate Equality scores.

entries.name: VeteranFriendly
entries.description: Employers featured on Military Times ‘Best for Vets’ rankings.

entries.name: HydrogenCCS
entries.description: Leaders in hydrogen fuel-cell, solar and zero-carbon-power or carbon-capture tech.

entries.name: AIEthics
entries.description: Tech giants that signed the 2023 U.S. voluntary AI-safety pledge.

entries.name: CircularEconomy
entries.description: Large-caps with significant recycling, reuse or circular-design initiatives.

entries.name: ICLN
entries.description: iShares Global Clean Energy ETF—global portfolio of renewable-energy equities.

entries.name: TAN
entries.description: Invesco Solar ETF—focuses on companies deriving most revenue from solar power.

entries.name: PHO
entries.description: Invesco Water Resources ETF—U.S. firms in water purification and infrastructure.

entries.name: AQWA
entries.description: Global X Clean Water ETF—global companies advancing clean-water solutions.

entries.name: EIS
entries.description: iShares MSCI Israel ETF—broad exposure to Israeli equities.

entries.name: ISRA
entries.description: VanEck Israel ETF—tracks the BlueStar Israel Global Index of Israeli-linked firms.

entries.name: FRDM
entries.description: Freedom 100 Emerging Markets ETF—weights EM equities by civil and economic freedom.

entries.name: RSX
entries.description: VanEck Russia ETF (liquidated 2025) providing pre-suspension Russia equity exposure.

entries.name: ERUS
entries.description: iShares MSCI Russia ETF—trading halted March 2022 amid sanctions.

entries.name: SHE
entries.description: SPDR MSCI USA Gender Diversity ETF—U.S. firms leading in gender diversity.

entries.name: LGBT
entries.description: LGBTQ100 ESG ETF—basket of LGBTQ-inclusive U.S. companies (closed 2022).

entries.name: VETS
entries.description: Pacer Military Times Best Employers ETF—tracks companies ranked ‘Best for Vets’.
